message: Hi Jude, How are you mate?
I’m good and happy to hear from you after a long time.
Yes Jude, I’m little busy here. Anyway, I called you because wanna congratulate you.
Thank you very much. It’s so nice.
Today is one of the happiest days in your life. So enjoy the day.
But my marriage is fixed for tomorrow
That’s why I said, today is one of your happiest days
